original_text: And the cow and the bear shall feed; their young ones shall lie down together: and the lion shall eat straw like the ox.
korean_text: 암소와 곰이 함께 먹으며 그것들의 새끼가 함께 엎드리며 사자가 소처럼 풀을 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: And the cow and the bear shall feed
their young ones shall lie down together
and the lion shall eat straw like the ox
